definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The only non-ceasefire group active along the border is the Shan State Army "South"'s Force 701.
sentences.chinese: 沿边境活跃的唯一非停火武装是南掸邦军701部队。

sentences.english: Last June, Israel and Hamas agreed to a six-month truce.
sentences.chinese: 去年6月，以色列和哈马斯同意6个月的停火协议。

sentences.english: The attack breached their cease-fire agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他们的进攻行动违反了停火协定。

sentences.english: A ceasefire will take effect in just hours on the Lebanese-Israeli border.
sentences.chinese: 黎以边境再过几个小时就可以实现停火了。

sentences.english: However, the state-level ceasefire effort was rejected by the KIO, Kumhtat La Nan, General Secretary-2 of the KIO said.
sentences.chinese: 然而，邦政府的和平停火努力被克钦独立组织拒绝。

sentences.english: Heavy fighting erupted there today after a two-day cease -fire.
sentences.chinese: 在停火两天后，今天那里爆发了激烈的战斗。

sentences.english: The United Nations Security Council approved a joint cease-fire resolution.
sentences.chinese: 联合国安理会通过了一个联合停火决议。
1988年的今天，两伊战争宣布停火。

sentences.english: The main fear was that both sides might seize (up) on a cease-fire to rearm.
sentences.chinese: 主要的担心在于双方都可能抓住停火时机重整军备。

sentences.english: After India occupied Dacca, the Soviet Union also required India to cease fire.
sentences.chinese: 当印度占领达卡后，苏联也要求印度停火。

sentences.english: The UN has called on both sides to observe the ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 联合国号召交战双方遵守停火协定。

sentences.english: So far the ceasefire has been observed by both sides.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，双方都遵守着停火协定。

sentences.english: It also requires Hamas to stop its policies of confrontation and start becoming a part of the process,” Duguid said.
sentences.chinese: 停火还要求哈马斯放弃对抗政策，开始参与和平进程。

sentences.english: The PKK has stepped up attacks after ending its unilateral cease-fire last month.
sentences.chinese: 库尔德工人党已加强其单方面停火结束上个月的攻击。

sentences.english: In 546 BC, Jin and Chu agreed to yet another truce.
sentences.chinese: 在546年，金楚同意又一次停火协议。

sentences.english: the ceasefires have not addressed the underlying causes of ethnic conflict in Burma.
sentences.chinese: 停火并没有解决缅甸民族冲突的根源。

definition: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE), abbr. for 歐洲安全與合作組織|欧洲安全与合作组织[Ou1 zhou1 An1 quan2 yu3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1]
Gaza/same as 加沙地帶|加沙地带[Jia1 sha1 di4 dai4], the Gaza strip
